EmailTemplate.name: Project Memo Approval OU Director
EmailTemplate.subject: Project Memo Approval OU Director
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Please find attached the CRADA Approval Memo regarding the proposed project with {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Partner__c}, titled {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Title__c}. According to NIST Policy, each CRADA project requires approval from the relevant Division Chief and the Director of the Operating Unit. The Division Chief has approved this CRADA project.
If you approve the project, please click here and "approve" the agreement, alternatively, you can reply to this email with the word approve and your approval will be documented. If you have any proposed changes, please feel free to contact {!Agreement__c.Agreement_Officer__c}.
Thank you.
